content: **jelly beanie - crochet pattern pdf download** this pattern is available for free on my blog - www loopsandlovecrochet com here you are paying to purchase an ad-free printable version of this crochet pattern the pdf pattern includes written instructions with a photo tutorial of the stitches/instructions to help you along the way if needed there is also a video tutorial for these stitches on my youtube channel this pattern is intermediate-beginner friendly but it is also a fun pattern for more experienced crocheters this beanie pattern includes instructions for sizes newborn to adult materials needed - worsted weight yarn - 5 mm crochet hook -yarn needle to weave in ends - fun pom pom to attach optional **you may make and sell any items made from this pattern but please link back to this pattern or loops & love crochet please do not share reproduce or copy this pattern for any purpose please do not re-publish photos as your own thank you for respecting my rights as the designer and for supporting loops & love crochet thank you and happy crocheting loops & love crochet
